title: A wobbly consumer is one reason investors shouldn’t be tempted to buy stock-market dips, says BofA
description: Investors should not be tempted back into the stock market until certain criteria are met, says BofA.

title: It’s time to start nibbling on Lowe’s and Williams-Sonoma’s stocks, analyst says
description: Patient investors will see the benefits of taking small purchases of these stocks.

title: Samuel Adams’s parent company points to gains in light beer as tastes shift from craft brews
description: Boston Beer Co. says that the company faces long-term challenges.

title: A cruel summer looms, but here’s why JPMorgan still expects a higher S&P 500 finish this year
description: The mood will improve later in 2025 as tariff angst eases, and focus turns to tax cuts and deregulation

title: Yes, this stock market is hard to predict — but it always is. Here’s what’s even harder.
description: It’s difficult to overcome “hindsight bias” — thinking that investing was easier than it really was.

title: Intel’s turnaround deemed a ‘herculean task’ — so analysts say to avoid the stock
description: Intel’s stock is down after earnings, and “there seems little to get excited about,” even with shares at depressed levels, noted one analyst.

title: Think groceries are already too expensive? Wait until RFK Jr.’s food-dye ban hits, experts say.
description: The cost of going from synthetic to natural dyes could hike annual food costs by thousands of dollars per household, one data scientist warns.

title: Don’t count on ‘drill, baby, drill,’ Schlumberger says
description: Schlumberger’s stock falls after a rare earnings miss and a warning that a slowing economy and uncertain tariff policies could hurt demand for oil drilling.

title: Municipal bonds are now a bargain thanks to Trump’s tariff turmoil
description: Munis are paying interest rates that are irrationally generous.

title: ‘I survived a head-on car wreck’: I’m on Medicaid, but inheriting $290K. How do I protect it from the 5-year look-back rule?
description: “About 30 years ago, I survived a head-on car wreck. I was put on 100% disability. I have not worked since.”
